fiction.name: Action and Adventure
fiction.description: Stories centered on a protagonist in dangerous and exciting situations.

fiction.name: Crime and Mystery
fiction.description: Focuses on a crime and the process of solving it, often featuring a detective.

fiction.name: Fantasy
fiction.description: Features magical or supernatural elements, often in an imaginary world.

fiction.name: Historical Fiction
fiction.description: Fictional stories set in a real historical period.

fiction.name: Horror
fiction.description: Aims to scare, startle, and evoke a feeling of dread in the reader.

fiction.name: Literary Fiction
fiction.description: Character-driven novels that focus on themes, style, and emotional depth rather than a strong plot.

fiction.name: Romance
fiction.description: Centers on the relationship and romantic love between two or more characters.

fiction.name: Science Fiction
fiction.description: Stories with imaginary elements that are scientifically plausible, often exploring the future or technology.

fiction.name: Thriller and Suspense
fiction.description: Fast-paced, plot-driven stories designed to create anxiety and excitement.

fiction.name: Western
fiction.description: Stories set in the American Old West, often featuring cowboys and a focus on rugged individualism.

fiction.name: Children's and Young Adult (YA)
fiction.description: While often considered age-group categories, they are so popular that they function as genres with their own subgenres.

nonfiction.name: Biography and Memoir
nonfiction.description: The life story of a person, written either by another author (biography) or by the subject themselves (memoir).

nonfiction.name: History
nonfiction.description: Explores real historical events, figures, and time periods.

nonfiction.name: Self-Help
nonfiction.description: Provides guidance and advice on personal problems.

nonfiction.name: Science and Technology
nonfiction.description: Explores various scientific and technological topics.

nonfiction.name: True Crime
nonfiction.description: Factual accounts of real crimes and their investigation.

nonfiction.name: Cookbooks
nonfiction.description: Collections of recipes and cooking instructions.

other_formats.name: Graphic Novel
other_formats.description: A novel told in a comic-strip format. Can be fiction or nonfiction.

other_formats.name: Poetry
other_formats.description: Literature written in verse, often with a focus on rhythm and imagery.

other_formats.name: Drama
other_formats.description: Written for performance, either on a stage or screen.
